sections.value:
A ritual that creates a display of fireworks!

Of each firework rocket reagent, 5 fireworks of that type will be set off, in 1 second intervals, for a total of 20 fireworks!

A ritual for removing and catching the enchantments of an item!

The ritual requires an unenchanted book (an enchanted book may be used, but its prior enchantments will be wiped) and a piece of enchanted equipement. The equipment will be destroyed, and its enchantments will be reallocated to the book.

A ritual that creates a temporary radius of potion effect!

INCOMPLETE
